title: Fun with the Family New Mexico (Fun with the Family Series)
features: Experience the unforgettable entrancement of New Mexico -- from the drama of De Maria's Lightning Field to the isolation of Christ in the Desert Monastery to the Wild West charm of rodeos and country fairs.
description: Here's the inside information on all the family-friendly fun to be had in the Land of Enchantment. Fun with the Family New Mexico leads the way to pueblos, ski slopes, children's museums, zoos, festivals, parks, wildlife refuges, and much more.Written by parents, for parents, this opinionated, personal, and easy-to-use guide has the best things to see and do to keep the kids busy and happy for an hour, a day, or a weekend-a guaranteed antidote to vacation boredom!Take a look inside for: Current information on New Mexico's family attractions; quick reference icons; regional maps; age-appropriate guidelines; kid-friendly restaurants and places to stay.
